title: New Villa Development
details:
We are pleased to offer this unique villa development in Weligama at the final stage of completion.

Each of the spectacular four villas comprising a, is based on the award-winning Shela Beach House in Lamu, Kenya, and designed by the same architect, in conjunction with Muditha Prematilaka, a talented young Sri Lankan architect. Each villa is built into the hillside of a stunning natural site – with uninterrupted views of a secluded palm-fringed cove, a white sandy beach and the clear waters of the Indian Ocean. Each villa is hallmarked by meticulous attention to detail, with stunning custom-crafted interiors and wide south-facing vistas to the ocean. Distinguished from other luxury villas, the villas comprising On Houses, Weligama, are set in generous gardens, with mature trees and spectacular natural landscaping.

Features

• Fully furnished

• 5 en-suite bedrooms

• Handcrafted high quality finishes throughout

• Private infinity edge pool

• Generous terraces and verandahs

• Spacious living and dining areas

• Outdoor dining pavilion

• Fully equipped kitchen

• Private gym

• Secure garage

• Exquisite landscaping
